solution_line_template: The school band earned ${amount_per_family_10}/family * {num_families_10} families = $<<{amount_per_family_10}*{num_families_10}={earned_10}>>{earned_10} from three families.
The school band earned ${amount_per_family_5}/family * {num_families_5} families = $<<{amount_per_family_5}*{num_families_5}={earned_5}>>{earned_5} from 15 families.
The school band needs ${goal} - ${total_earned} = $<<{goal}-{total_earned}={amount_needed}>>{amount_needed} more to reach their goal.
